revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Actiontec |model=GT704WG |fcc_date=03/15/2004 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=LNQGT704 |us_id=LNQDL00BGT704 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=3.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=TNETD7300;TNETD7300GDU, 62AD4RW; |cpu1_cspeed=150 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320ABTC-90 |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ICSI |ram1_model=IC42S16800-7T |jtag=yes |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 6-pin header,, populated,, (38400,8,N,1),, |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=TNETW1130;TNETW1130GVF, 5CP8848, DC; |wi1_chip2_brand=Radia |wi1_chip2_model=RC2422B |wi1_chip3_brand=Radia |wi1_chip3_model=RC2326 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |addl_chips=Serial EEPROM (8 Kbit);Atmel;AT24C08AN;;1; |flags=ADSL2+,schematics |stock_boot=ADAM2;0.22.02; |stock_os=Linux;2.4.17;MontaVista;mvl21-malta-mips fp le; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=XXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^[A-Z0-9]{5}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:0F:B3 |oui_eth=00:0F:B3 }} {{TagLine|54 Mbps Wireless DSL Gateway with 4-Port Router}} :[http://www.actiontec.com/products/product.php?pid=40 Product page] {{â€¢}} [http://www.actiontec.com/products/manuals/GT704-WG_NCS_User_Manual_3.0.1.0.6.0s.pdf User manual]
The SSID follows a pattern of 5 letters and numbers (example: EJB67). :Per the label, the WEP key appears to be last 5 octets of the unit :MAC address (which may be the WLAN MAC minus 3 hex digits).
The included power supply is a '''Actiontec''' AD-1260 (12V DC, 0.6A). :ID/OD/Len measurements are not exact.
*[https://openwrt.org/toh/actiontec/gt704wg ''Actiontec GT704WG'' on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
